1.ランババさんは グレン城の兵士たちを鍛える\n教官さんだ。彼の指導を受ければ レ:
Ranbaba is the instructor who trains the
soldiers at Glen Castle. With his guidance,
you can get skill points aside from leveling!

99.ラセドさんは 武器鍛冶職人のギルドマスターを\nしているんだ。彼なら 君を 一人:
Rasedo is the Weaponsmith Guildmaster.
I'm sure he'll make you a full-fledged
Weaponsmith!

189.ジウバさんは スキルポイントの振り直しに関する\n特別な儀式を担当してる。振り直:
Jiuba is in charge of a special ceremony
regarding skill point reassignment. If you
want a fresh start, talk to him about it.

281.カヤヌちゃんは 風の町アズランに くわしいぜ。\n特に かけ出しの冒険者には 思:
Kayanu knows Azlan pretty well.
He's a kind town guide to new adventurers and
gives them tips for their adventure.

380.スージンさんは ジュレットの町に くわしいね。\n特に かけ出しの冒険者には 世:
Suujin knows Julet very well. He's a
caring town guide to new adventurers and gives
them tips for their adventure.

476.ユービアさんは さいほう職人のギルドマスターを\nしているんだ。彼なら 君を 一:
Yubia is the sewing guildmaster.
I'm sure he'll make you a full-fledged Sewer!

571.ササラナさんは ゴーレック氏の宝物の管理を\n任されている 整理が得意な女性なん:
Sasalana is the woman in charge of managing
Golek's treasures, and she's an expert
organizer. It's great that she's so organized!

666.パルノさんは レンタル衣装屋を 営んでいるね。\n君も 興味があれば 会ってみる:
Parno runs a costume rental shop.
You should meet him, if you're interested.
Maybe he can get you an unusual outfit?

761.ツィンマさんは 岳都ガタラに くわしいんだ。\n特に かけ出しの冒険者には とっ:
Tzinma knows Mount Gatara very well. He's a
friendly town guide to new adventurers and
gives them tips for their adventure.

857.メンメちゃんは 岳都ガタラにいる学者さんだね。\nドルボードっていう 神カラクリ:
Menme is a scholar in Mount Gatara. She
seems to be very fond of a godlike vehicle
called a Dolboard.

944.ヒヒッポフ君は オルフェアの町にくわしいね。\n特に かけ出しの冒険者には 愛想:
Hihippofu knows Orphea very well.
He's a sociable town guide to new adventurers
and gives them tips for their journey.

1128.ペピール君のコイン屋は 魔法の迷宮で使える\nボスコインの販売をしているんだ。少:
Pepeelu at the coin shop sells boss coins that
can be used in the Magic Maze. A little
expensive, but the boss coin is worth a shot.

1223.ピピルさんは カラーリングの仕事をしているね。\n装備品の色を 変えることができ:
Pipil is in the dyeing business. You can
change the color of your equipment, but you'll
need flowers, so don't forget them!

1316.ゴーレック氏は ちいさなメダルの収集が\n生きがいなんだ！ 君も たくさん持って:
Golek lives for collecting mini medals!
If you have a lot of them, you might be able
to trade them for some of his treasures.

1412.ウェルナーさんは モンスター討伐隊の\n隊長さんだ。たくさん魔物を 倒して\n彼:
Werner is the captain of the Monster Strike
Force. If you defeat lots of monsters, report
back to him for something good.

1495.ヴェキオ君は ランプ錬金職人のギルドマスターを\nしているんだ。彼なら 君を 一:
Vecchio is the Lamp Alchemy Guildmaster.
I'm sure he'll make you a full-fledged Lamp
Alchemist!

1591.トート君は どうぐかばん工房で お父さんの\nお手伝いをしているんだ。まだ小さい:
Tote helps his father at the bag workshop.
He's still small, but he's very strong and I'm
looking forward to seeing his future.

1680.クライブさんは コロシアムの受付をしている。\n彼に申請すれば コロシアムに参加:
Clive works as a receptionist at the Coliseum.
You can apply with him and he'll get you into
the Coliseum, so go if you're interested.

1779.ペレーレさんは よく 通行人をながめては\nブツブツつぶやいていたな。おしゃれへ:
Perere used to mumble to himself as he gazed
at passersby. He seems to be very interested
in fashion. I wish he could see me too.

1877.ドロシーも 魔法の迷宮という ダンジョンへ\n行けるらしいね。ロンデとは 少し違:
Dorothy can take you a dungeon called the
Magic Maze. It looks different from Ronde's,
but if you're brave enough, give it a try!

1975.マジリクさんは 昔 冒険者だったみたいだぜ。\n君にとって 大先輩だから 彼の年:
Majirik used to be an adventurer, you know.
He's definitely seen his fair share at his age,
so maybe he'll be able to help you out?

2065.ユクさんは 柱屋を営んでいる。\n自宅を 建てているなら\nお気に入りの柱を 探:
Yuku runs a pillar shop.
If you are building your own house, you may
want to look for your favorite pillars.

2136.カンナさんは 木工職人のギルドマスターを\nしているんだ。彼女なら 君を 一人前:
Kanna is the Woodworking Guildmaster.
I'm sure he'll make you a full-fledged
Woodworker!

2225.リリムさんは 防具鍛冶職人のギルドマスターを\nしているんだ。彼女なら 君を 一:
Lilim is the Armorsmith Guildmaster.
I'm sure she'll make you a full-fledged
Armorsmith!

2320.ポーリアさんは ツボ錬金職人のギルドマスターを\nしているんだ。彼女なら 君を:
Paulia is the Jar Alchemy Guildmaster.
I'm sure she'll make you a full-fledged Jar
Alchemist!

2416.バレクスさんは 道具鍛冶職人のギルドマスターを\nしているんだ。彼なら 君を 一:
Barex is the Toolsmith Guildmaster.
I'm sure he'll make you a full-fledged
Toolsmith!

2511.リーネさんは アクセサリー合成屋をしている。\n同じアクセサリーを ２個以上 持:
Renee is an accessory synthesizer. If you
bring two or more of the same accessory, she
will synthesize them for you.

2598.サルバリータさんは スーパースターを\n目指せそうな人を 求めている。彼女に会え:
Sarubarita is looking for someone who wants to be
a Superstar. Meet her, and you could be on your
way to stardom!

2693.ジェイコフ氏は 有名なバトルマスターだったけど\n今は……。君が バトルマスター:
Jakov was a renowned Battlemaster, but now...
You should talk to him if you're interested in
being a battlemaster.

2782.ストロング団長は ガートラント聖騎士団の\nえらーい人さ。聖騎士団は 雇われパラ:
Commander Strong is a very good man of the
Gartlant Holy Knights. I hear the Holy Knights
are looking to hire a Paladin. Interested?

2874.ティーザさんは 賢者を目指す人を\n募集しているんだ。賢者への転職を 望むのなら:
Tiza is looking for someone who wants to
become a Sage. If you want to move on to a
Sage, talk to her!

2949.ユナティさんは 魔法戦士になりたい人へ\n手ほどきをしてくれるんだ。魔法戦士に\:
Yunaty mentors those who want to become
an Armamentalist. If you're interested in
becoming one, go and talk to her!

3033.ミズヒキさんは レンジャーを目指す人を\n募集しているね。レンジャーに なりたけ:
Mizuhiki is looking for people who want to
become a Ranger. If you want to be a ranger,
he will guide you.

3114.オットーさんは 討伐隊の依頼書を管理している。\nもし 討伐依頼書を持っていたら:
Otto manages the request forms for the Strike
Force. If you have a subjugation request form,
visit him. I'm sure you'll hear all about it.

3210.ネジロさんは カギ開けの名人なんだ。\n堅固な扉も宝箱も ぱぱっと 開けちゃうん:
Nejiro is a lock-picking master. He can open
solid doors and treasure chests in an instant.
It'd be amusing to steal that skill from him.

3306.ポポルちゃんは 着ている装備品の 見た目だけを\n別の装備にする 魔法仕立て術が:
Popol can do a magic tailoring trick to make a
piece of equipment look like another. If you
want to change your look, talk to her.

3411.ドクチョル博士は ドルワームの学者さんだ。\n世界中の七不思議について 研究をし:
Dr. Dokchul is a Dolworm scholar.
He researches the Seven Wonders of the World.
His stories are romantic and very interesting.

3509.レモンハルトは 名門出身の騎士なんだけど\nいつも 魔物当てクイズを 開催してい:
Lemonheart is a knight from a prestigious
family, and he's always holding a monster quiz.
I...feel a sort of closeness towards him.

3605.マンジュさんは アズラン温泉の番台さんだ。\n彼女と話せば 大浴場に 入れてもら:
Manju is the attendant of Azlan Hot Springs.
She might just let you inside the bathhouse.
Go and enjoy a niiiice, relaxing bath.

3706.ロンデは 魔法の迷宮という ダンジョンへ\n行けるカギを 持っているんだ。\n勇:
Ronde has a key to a dungeon called the Magic
Maze. If you have the courage, give his trials
a shot!

3793.クラハさんは まもの使いを募集しているね。\nまもの使いになりたいのなら\n彼女:
Klaha is looking for a Monster Master.
If you want to become a Monster Master, go to
her and ask her for advice.

3876.タンスは どうぐ使いになりたい人が 訪れるのを\n待っているようだよ。どうぐ使い:
Wardrobe is waiting for someone who wants to
be an Item Master. If you are interested in
Item Master, you should talk to him.

3965.フォリンちゃんは カジノについて教えてくれる。\nカジノでなら 一攫千金の夢が:
Forin can tell you about the Casino.
At the Casino, you can dream about being rich!
Be careful not to play too much.

4063.イサラちゃんは カジノコインの販売をしてるぜ。\n一度に買える カジノコイン枚数:
Isara is selling Casino Tokens.
There is a limit to the number of Casino
Tokens you can buy at one time.

4155.リーニャちゃんは カジノコインと景品を\n交換してくれる。私がほしい景品は……っ:
Linya will trade prizes for Casino Tokens.
You want prizes... and more!
There's a lot of stuff here, so take a peek!

4251.ハルモス老師は 釣り界の伝説的な人らしいぜ。\n私は 見よう見まねで 釣りを覚え:
Old Master Harmos is a legend in the fishing
world. I learned to fish by watching, but
maybe you can learn directly from him!

4347.ポシェルちゃんは 調理職人のギルドマスターを\nしているんだ。彼女なら 君を 一:
Poshel is the Cooking Guildmaster.
I'm sure he'll make you a full-fledged Cook!

4439.ミーネさんは アクセサリー復元屋をしている。\n同じアイテムの欠片を まとまった:
Meene runs an accessory restoration shop. If
you bring a large number of pieces of the same
item, she'll restore it to its original form.

4531.デコリーちゃんは ドルボードのカスタムを\n仕事にしているんだ。乗り物の見た目に:
Decory is in the business of customizing
Dolboards. If you're interested in the look of
your ride, have her customize it for you.

4624.ユリユリちゃんは 花火と花火グッズを\n交換してくれるぜ。ちょっと クセのある娘:
Yuriyuri will exchange fireworks and fireworks
goods. She's a little quirky, but once you get
used to her, you'll love her... maybe!

4722.クルさんは 壁屋を営んでいる。\n大きな家ほど 壁で 部屋をきっちり\n分けたく:
Ku runs a wall shop. The bigger the house, the
more you want to divide the rooms with walls.
I'm a neat and tidy person.

4805.ワルキュウリは 強戦士ベジセルクとなれる人を\n探している。アイツの試練に合格す:
Val-cu-rie is looking for someone who can be
a strong Cucumberserk warrior. I heard that if
you pass his test, you get a special book.

4891.タバネちゃんは 整理術なる 技を学んでいたね。\n君の持っているアイテムも 彼女:
Tabane was learning the art of organization.
I'm sure she'd be able to arrange your items
nicely?

4984.クラリッサちゃんは 香水やボスカードなんかを\n交換してくれる。ボスカードの期限:
Clarissa will exchange perfume, boss cards,
etc. If your boss card is about to expire,
maybe you could ask her to replace it.

5083.チャガナは 特殊な装備を販売しているんだ。\nただし 売ってくれる商品は お客さ:
Chagana sells specialized equipment.
However, he only sell products that are
appropriate for the height of the customer.

5172.ププルンちゃんは お花を交換してくれるんだ。\nほしい色の花が あったら\n一度:
Pupurun will trade you flowers.
If you see a flower in the color you want, you
should pay her a visit.

5253.バンリィちゃんは 君が 訪れたことのある\n場所であれば どこへでも飛ばしてくれ:
Banry will fly you to any place you've ever
been! If you're looking for a place to go, ask
her, she'll make it easy!

5352.ナッチョスさんは 踊り子のプロデューサーで\n踊り子を目指す人を 募集しているね:
Nachos is a producer of dancers and is looking
for people who want to become dancers.
If you're interested in a dancer, talk to him!

5445.メリーポコちゃんは 特別なチケットを持った\n冒険者たちと 素敵なアイテムを交換:
Meripoko trades nice items with adventurers
who have special tickets. Where can I get
tickets?

5540.ピピィアンヌちゃんは 服装に こだわりが\nあるみたいだ。気前が よさそうだった:
Pipianne looks to be pretty particular about
her clothing. She seems the generous type, so
maybe she'll give you something nice?

5632.ユノちゃんは 見習い占い師を募集しているぜ。\n占い師になってみたければ 占いの:
Juno is looking for an apprentice Fortune
Teller. If you want to be a Fortune Teller,
ask her at the fortune teller's house.

5718.トマルさんは 壁かけ屋を営んでいる。\n食器や 棚を壁に飾りたいなら\n彼女の店:
Tomal runs a wall decor shop.
If you want to decorate your walls with
tableware and shelves, stop by her shop.

5795.ユーラちゃんは 水着を販売しているんだ。\nジュレットの町で 泳げるみたいだから:
Yula sells swimsuits.
If you want to go swimming in Julet, go on and
buy one! It'll be fun a time!

5888.アミちゃんは すごろくの案内をしているのさ。\nすごろくは みんなで遊んだ方が楽:
Amy is a Sugoroku Guide.
Sugoroku is more fun when played with others,
so I wish I could be a part of it. Phew.

5981.サンビタリアとは 私のことだぜ！ ふふっ。\n私に会いたいだろうと思って 書いて:
Sanvitalia is me, baby! Phew.
I wrote it down because I knew you'd want to
see me. If you feel up to it, pay me a visit.

6071.ランリィちゃんは 君が 訪れたことのある\n場所であれば どこへでも飛ばしてくれ:
Ranry will fly you to any place you've ever
been! If you're looking for a place to go, ask
her, she'll make it easy!

6170.キーネさんは 交換屋をしているぜ。\n特定のアクセサリーを 砕いて\n欠片のアイ:
Kine has an exchange shop.
He can break special accessories into pieces
and exchange them for shard items.

6247.ホッチャさんは 採掘のギルドマスターさんだね。\n採掘ギルドは 今 休業してるん:
Hotcha is the Mining Guildmaster.
The Mining Guild is closed right now, but
they're looking for someone to help out.

6343.アークさんに 錬金効果の付いた装備品を 渡すと\nその錬金効果を 成長させてもら:
Arc will take a piece of equipment with an
alchemy effect, and he will grow the alchemy
effect for you.

6439.ププリンちゃんは 同じ色のお花を\nまとまった数 持っていくと 家具の花束に\n:
Pupurin will exchange a bouquet of flowers for
bouquet furniture of the same color if you
bring many same-colored flowers.

6529.アサヒちゃんは 天地雷鳴士になりたい人を\n探しているぜ。天地雷鳴士に 興味があ:
Asahi is looking for someone who wants to be a
Druid. If you're interested in being one, go on
and answer her call!

6615.カルタ君は 玩具屋を 営んでいるんだ。\n『ついてクンカプセル』ってモノを 持っ:
Karuta runs a toy shop. If you've got something
called a pet capsule, I'd show it to him. It'll
be worth your while, I promise!

6713.ルッチー君は 遊び人たちが 集うサークル\n遊びクラブの代表だよ。もし 遊び人に:
Lucchi is the head of the Circle Play Club, a
group of Gadabouts. If you're interested in
the Gadabout, talk to him!

6800.デズリンさんは デスマスターの志望者を\n集めているようだね。もし デスマスター:
Deathlin is gathering aspiring Death Masters.
If you're interested in the Death Master, talk
to her!

6890.こちらのクエストを 遊ぶには\n追加パッケージ「眠れる勇者と導きの盟友」の\nレ:
In order to play this quest, you will need to
register the the additional package
"The Sleeping Hero & the Guiding Ally".

6976.カジノフロアに 入るためには\n追加パッケージ「眠れる勇者と導きの盟友」の\nレ:
In order to enter the casino floor, you will
need to register the the additional package
"The Sleeping Hero & the Guiding Ally".

7062.プリゼーラさんは 戦士とパラディンを\n極めた人を 探しているようだよ。ガーディ:
Prisera is looking for someone who has mastered
both the Warrior and Paladin vocations.
If you're interested, why not go see her?

7152.こちらのクエストを 遊ぶには\n追加パッケージ「天星の英雄たち」の\nプレイ権利:
In order to play this quest, you must have the
right to play the additional package
"Heroes of the Heavens".

7221.こちらのクエストを 遊ぶには\n追加パッケージ「天星の英雄たち」の\nインストー:
In order to play this quest, you will need to
install the the additional package
"Heroes of the Heavens".

7287.ランジェさんは 魔法使いと魔法戦士を\n極めた人を 探しているんだって。竜術士に:
Ranje is looking for those who've mastered both the
Mage and Armamentalist vocations. If you want to be
a Dragomancer, go and speak to her!

7376.ペリッツ君は 世界宿屋協会に所属する\n開発者なんだって。とっても冒険の役に立つ:
Peritz is a developer working for the World
Association of Innkeepers. He'll show you a nifty
app that all adventurers will find useful.

7465.こちらのクエストを 遊ぶには 追加パッケージ\n「未来への扉とまどろみの少女」の:
In order to play this quest, you must have the
right to play the additional package
The Door to the Future & the Slumbering Girl.

7545.こちらのクエストを 遊ぶには 追加パッケージ\n「いばらの巫女と滅びの神」の\n:
In order to play this quest, you must have the
right to play the additional package
"The Thorny Maiden & the God of Destruction".

7622.こちらのクエストを 遊ぶには\n追加パッケージ「眠れる勇者と導きの盟友」の\nイ:
In order to play this quest, you will need to
install the the additional package
"The Sleeping Hero & the Guiding Ally".

7694.カジノフロアに 入るためには\n追加パッケージ「眠れる勇者と導きの盟友」の\nイ:
In order to enter the casino floor, you will
need to install the the additional package
"The Sleeping Hero & the Guiding Ally".

7766.こちらのクエストを 遊ぶには 追加パッケージ\n「未来への扉とまどろみの少女」の:
In order to play this quest, you will need to
install the the additional package
The Door to the Future & the Slumbering Girl.

7843.レンゲさんは ＤＱＸショップの 店員さんだぜ。\nクエストを代行して クリアして:
Rengue is a clerk at the DQX Shop. If you got any
quests you want automatically cleared, she'll
get them conveniently completed for you.

7936.こちらのクエストを 遊ぶには 追加パッケージ\n「いばらの巫女と滅びの神」の\n:
In order to play this quest, you will need to
install the the additional package
"The Thorny Maiden & the God of Destruction".

8010.プゴルさんは 大富豪協会の 会員さんだ。\n大富豪で 遊ぶための トランプケース:
Pugol is a member of the Tycoon Club.
You can get a case of playing cards to play
Tycoon, just ask for it.

8097.アガサさんは つるぎの酒場というところで\n魔剣士の人達に お仕事を紹介している:
At a tavern called Doom 'n' Gloom, Agatha is
introducing jobs to aspiring Demon Swordsmen.
If you're interested, why not check it out?

8198.ドロフィは 特殊な家具や庭具を販売しているよ。\nただし 売ってくれる商品は お:
Dorofi sells special decor and garden decor.
However, he only sell products that are
appropriate for the height of the customer.

8290.レッパ君は マドロック海賊団の団員さんで\n新入りを募集してるそうだよ。大砲をブ:
Reppa, is a member of the Madlock Pirates and
they are looking for new recruits. If you're
interested in the pirate, go talk to him!

8386.イマリちゃんは グレン城下町に くわしいんだ。\n特に かけ出しの冒険者には 優:
Imari knows Glen Castle Town very well.
She's a gentle town guide to new adventurers
and gives them tips for their adventure.

8481.こちらのクエストを 遊ぶには\n追加パッケージ「いにしえの竜の伝承」の\nレジス:
In order to play this quest, you will need to
register the the additional package
"Lore of the Ancient Dragon".

8564.こちらのクエストを 遊ぶには 追加パッケージ\n「５０００年の旅路 遥かなる故郷:
In order to play this quest, you must have the
right to play the additional package
"5000 Year Journey to a Faraway Hometown".

8648.こちらのクエストを 遊ぶには\n追加パッケージ「いにしえの竜の伝承」の\nインス:
In order to play this quest, you will need to
install the the additional package
"Lore of the Ancient Dragon".

8717.こちらのクエストを 遊ぶには 追加パッケージ\n「５０００年の旅路 遥かなる故郷:
In order to play this quest, you will need to
install the the additional package
"5000 Year Journey to a Faraway Hometown".
